summary: Adds animated enchantments for weapons with matched magic school damage.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Animated Enchantments Overhaul[/SIZE]




[COLOR=#4F81BD][SIZE=4]I got permission from the original mod author, to release this mod version.

Original mod here  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14192/] Animated Enchantment Effects [/url][/SIZE]

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/41875-1-1378710171.jpg[/img]

[youtube]n3fSZZOyXC8[/youtube] [youtube]vLlbOpz5PsE[/youtube] [youtube]fMlvFlTvNZQ[/youtube] [youtube]AR-X2eCxgrI[/youtube] [youtube]zUgQ7LwDUf8[/youtube]

[SIZE=4]
Remade from scratch, removing unnecessary quests, content, sounds and adding new enchants, you can disenchant all the weapons and use the new effects.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=6]Features[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#4F81BD][LIST][SIZE=4]
[*][B]Works on vanilla and custom weapons.[/B]
[*]Sword Enchants; Fire, Frost, Shock, Absorb Health (Blood), Absorb Magicka (Magic), Soul Trap
[*]Two-Hand Sword Enchants; Fire, Frost, Shock, Absorb Health (Blood), Absorb Magicka (Magic), Soul Trap
[*]BattleAxes enchants; Fire, Frost, Absorb Health (Blood), Absorb Magicka (Magic) Soul Trap
[*]Daggers; Fire, Frost, Absorb Health (Blood), Absorb Magicka (Magic), Soul Trap
[*]Enchant Shadow of Death left untouched for battleaxes
[*]Fully working 2 enchants on single weapon, the strongest enchant will display the effect, more info below
[*]All enchantments are silent upon sheath/unsheath and silent in 3rd/1st person changes.
[*]Enchants are using vanilla Skyrim formulas for damage/cost/charges, nothing overpowered.
[*]Proper schools of magic applied to enchantments for more compatibility with other mods, they should work like their vanilla equivalents.
[*]Burn effect and duration are same as vanilla
[/SIZE][/LIST][/COLOR]


[SIZE=6]Where and how to get them?[/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][COLOR=#4F81BD]Whiterun, Dragon\'s Reach, Farengar Secret-Fire, chest near office entrance.[/COLOR][/SIZE]


[SIZE=4]Enchants Description   -   Damage and Weapon type support[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#4F81BD]
[LIST]

[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Frost Breath - Frost Damage [B]*ANY*[/B] Weapon[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Flames Breath - Fire Damage Sword[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Shock Breath - Shock Damage Sword[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Blood Breath - Absorb Health Sword[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Magic Breath - Absorb Magicka Sword[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Flames Breath Dagger - Fire Damage Dagger[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Blood Breath Dagger - Absorb Health Dagger[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Magic Breath Dagger - Absorb Magicka Dagger[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Flames Breath Axe - Fire Damage Axe[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Blood Breath Axe - Absorb Health Axe[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Oblivion Magic Breath Axe - Absorb Magicka Axe[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Shadow of Death - Soul Trap Axe[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Shadow of Death Sword - Soul Trap Sword[/SIZE]
[*][SIZE=4]Shadow of Death Dagger - Soul Trap Dagger[/SIZE][/LIST] [/COLOR]



[SIZE=6]Enchanting - Extra Effect Perk[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD][SIZE=4]
The strongest enchant will determine which effect will display

Fire 30 + Frost 20 = Flame Sword display
Absorb Health 30 + Paralyze 2 seconds = Blood Sword display
etc..


You can mix the new effects or with vanilla enchants[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]Help[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD][LIST][SIZE=4]
[*]I get a sword mesh on top of my 2-handed axe
[*]I get a sword mesh on top of my dagger[/COLOR]
You need to use the matched enchantment for your weapon type, the default names are for swords, the rest are named accordingly.[/SIZE]
[/LIST]

[SIZE=6]Notes[/SIZE]
[COLOR=#4F81BD][SIZE=4]Mod is cleaned with TES5Edit

For now the effects are limited to 4 types of weapons, i lack the knowledge in meshes editing to expand the selection.

Yes i know some enchants do not fit some weapons properly and i doubt i could change it, users will have to try them out if the meshes fit.
[/COLOR][/SIZE]


[SIZE=6]To Install[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]Manual or use NMM to install the mod[/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]To Uninstall[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]Manual or use NMM to uninstall the mod[/COLOR]

[SIZE=6]Compatibility[/SIZE][COLOR=#4F81BD]
Compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39759/] Immersive Spells [/url]
Must be loaded BEFORE Animated Enchantments[/COLOR]

[SIZE=4]
Screenshots mods

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20022/] Hell Sword [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31229/] Drakul armors [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25097/] Blaze Of Eventide [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15494/] Dread Knight Weapon Set [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29123/] Highly transparent and refracting Glass armor weapon [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/] RealVision ENB [/url]
[/SIZE]


[SIZE=6]Thanks and Credits[/SIZE]

[COLOR=#4F81BD]
foster xbl - For the original mod
TKTK - Shock mesh - This author has not provided any additional notes regarding file permissions
Bethesda
[/COLOR]
author: GRIMELEVEN

files.name: Animated Enchantments Overhaul 1 dot 1
files.changelogHtml:
Shock effect 50% bigger.
Frost enchant replaced with a better version that can be put on any weapon in Skyrim.
Blood enchant - Added blood splatter effect that will cover the entire weapon.
Dragonsreach chest, ownership of items moved to player faction
Frost damage added slow effect debuff.
Fixed damage and charges the enchants were having, mistake on my end, sorry.
Blood texture - improved color
Soulreaperweapon added to Dragonsreach chest, teaches the Shadow of Death enchant (Soul Trap)

files.name: Animated Enchantments Overhaul 1_2_1
files.changelogHtml: esp module redone with 1.2 changes but without changes to weapon effects that may have caused crashes
